original: Lugner, Carl August Halfdan, bankdirektör, Uddevalla, f. 30/3/83 i Uddevalla av musikdir. August L. o. Sigrid Ingelotz. G. 08 m. Signe Franken-berg. Barn: Arne f. 09, kont., Varberg. — Stud. v. Uddevalla h. a. 1. samt Gbgs hand:inst. Anst. v. Bo-husl. Ensk. Bank 00, i A-B Gbgs ’Banks tj. 05, kassör där 12, kamrer 21, verkst. dir. o. styr :led. v. avd :kont. i Uddevalla 32, styr. ordf. i Thordén Lines A-B sed. 45, styr. ordf. i Uddevallavarvet ised. 46 m. fl. Styr:led. i Sannes Kolimp. A-B m. fl. föret. Led. av styr. f. Skand. Pipfabr. A-B sed. 36, en av stift, av Rotary i Uddevalla. Hobbies: friluftsliv, segling, jakt.
translated: Lugner, Carl August Halfdan, bank director, Uddevalla, born on March 30, 1883 in Uddevalla, son of music director August L. and Sigrid Ingelotz. Married in 1908 to Signe Franken-berg. Children: Arne, born in 1909, clerk, Varberg. Studied at Uddevalla high school and Gothenburg commercial institute. Employed at Bohuslan Enskilda Bank in 1900, at A-B Gothenburg Bank from 1905, became cashier in 1912, treasurer in 1921, executive director and board member of the Uddevalla branch office in 1932. Chairman of the board of Thordén Lines A-B since 1945 and Uddevallavarvet since 1946, among others. Board member of Sannes Kolimp. A-B and other companies. Board member of Skand. Pipfabr. A-B since 1936. Member of the Uddevalla Rotary Club. Hobbies: outdoor activities, sailing, hunting.
